name: Hextech Rocketbelt

active.name: Supersonic
active.effects: {{tip|Dash}} 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, then unleash an arc of 7 rockets forward which upon collision explode in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|185-radius|estimated}} area. Enemies within {{tt|85 units|center-to-edge, estimated}} of your dash and ones hit by any rocket's explosion are dealt {{as|100 {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}}, once per cast.

effects_structured.raw: {{tip Dash}} 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, then unleash an arc of 7 rockets forward which upon collision explode in a {{tip cr icononly = true}} {{tt 185-radius estimated}} area
Enemies within {{tt 85 units center-to-edge, estimated}} of your dash and ones hit by any rocket's explosion are dealt {{as 100 {{as (+ 10% AP)}} magic damage magic damage}}, once per cast.

simpleDescription: Activate to dash forward and unleash a fiery explosion

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
context_notes: Rocket explosion radius and dash hit radius are marked as estimated in source text.
